palettes.name: Ocean Breeze
palettes.description: Calm and professional - perfect for corporate websites
palettes.ideology: This palette uses cool blues to create a sense of trust, professionalism, and calmness. Ideal for financial, medical, or corporate websites.

palettes.name: Sunset Warmth
palettes.description: Energetic and creative - great for portfolios and creative agencies
palettes.ideology: Warm oranges and reds evoke energy, creativity, and enthusiasm. Perfect for creative portfolios, restaurants, or entertainment websites.

palettes.name: Forest Harmony
palettes.description: Natural and organic - ideal for eco-friendly and wellness brands
palettes.ideology: Green tones represent growth, nature, and harmony. Excellent for environmental, wellness, or organic product websites.

palettes.name: Royal Purple
palettes.description: Luxury and sophistication - perfect for premium brands
palettes.ideology: Purple conveys luxury, creativity, and sophistication. Ideal for premium brands, beauty products, or artistic websites.

palettes.name: Minimal Gray
palettes.description: Clean and modern - excellent for tech and minimalist designs
palettes.ideology: Neutral grays create a clean, professional, and timeless look. Perfect for tech companies, SaaS products, or minimalist designs.

palettes.name: Coral Reef
palettes.description: Vibrant and tropical - perfect for travel and lifestyle brands
palettes.ideology: Coral and orange tones create a vibrant, tropical feel. Great for travel, lifestyle, and energetic brands.

palettes.name: Midnight Blue
palettes.description: Deep and mysterious - ideal for nightlife and entertainment
palettes.ideology: Dark blues create a sophisticated, mysterious atmosphere. Perfect for nightlife, entertainment, or premium services.

palettes.name: Spring Bloom
palettes.description: Soft and gentle - great for feminine and wellness brands
palettes.ideology: Soft pinks and pastels create a gentle, nurturing atmosphere. Ideal for feminine brands, wellness, or baby products.

palettes.name: Desert Sunset
palettes.description: Warm and earthy - perfect for rustic and artisanal brands
palettes.ideology: Warm earth tones create a rustic, artisanal feel. Great for handmade products, cafes, or organic brands.

palettes.name: Ocean Depths
palettes.description: Deep and calming - ideal for meditation and wellness
palettes.ideology: Deep blue tones create a calming, meditative atmosphere. Perfect for wellness, meditation, or spa services.

palettes.name: Autumn Leaves
palettes.description: Rich and seasonal - great for fall and harvest themes
palettes.ideology: Rich autumn colors create a warm, seasonal atmosphere. Perfect for harvest themes, seasonal products, or cozy brands.

palettes.name: Neon Dreams
palettes.description: Bold and futuristic - perfect for modern tech and gaming
palettes.ideology: Bold neon colors create a futuristic, modern atmosphere. Ideal for tech, gaming, or cutting-edge brands.
